tool.name: lindna
tool.description: Draws linear maps of DNA constructs

param.name: gapsize
param.label: Interval between ticks in the ruler

param.name: ticklines
param.label: Vertical lines at the ruler's ticks

param.name: textheight
param.label: Height of text
param.help: Enter a number <1.0 or >1.0 to decrease or increase the size, respectively

param.name: textlength
param.label: Length of text
param.help: Enter a number <1.0 or >1.0 to decrease or increase the size, respectively

param.name: margin
param.label: Width of left margin
param.help: This is the region left to the groups where the names of the groups are displayed. Enter a number <1.0 or >1.0 to decrease or increase the size, respectively

param.name: tickheight
param.label: Height of ticks
param.help: Enter a number <1.0 or >1.0 to decrease or increase the size, respectively

param.name: blockheight
param.label: Height of blocks
param.help: Enter a number <1.0 or >1.0 to decrease or increase the size, respectively

param.name: rangeheight
param.label: Height of range ends
param.help: Enter a number <1.0 or >1.0 to decrease or increase the size, respectively

param.name: gapgroup
param.label: Space between groups
param.help: Enter a number <1.0 or >1.0 to decrease or increase the size, respectively

param.name: postext
param.label: Space between text and ticks, blocks, and ranges
param.help: Enter a number <1.0 or >1.0 to decrease or increase the size, respectively

tool.help:
You can view the original documentation here_.
